name: misarticulate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to pronounce a sound wrongly: The sounds most frequently misarticulated by Xhosa-speaking children were the same phonemes English, German, and Swedish children found difficult. Analyses were conducted to test whether children who mis-articulate the phoneme have a general phonemic sensitivity weakness. Synonym
mispronounceRelated word
articulate verb (PRONOUNCE) formal
More examplesFewer examplesThese are the sounds that the author claims are most likely to be misarticulated.Misarticulated phonemes in connected speech typically reflected errors produced during single-word articulation.Children are given nonsense syllables containing the misarticulated sounds.Each set of cards focuses on a frequently misarticulated speech sound.
